title: A Cat's Adventure. - A Curious Pursuit
author: Alan Roman
content_markdown: # A Cat's Adventure. ## A Curious Pursuit. Whiskers the cat considered his options. The red dot danced tantalizingly on the wall.  Must… catch… dot! he thought, launching himself into a graceful leap. He missed spectacularly, landing in a pile of laundry.  Worth it, he purred, batting at a stray sock.
